CharacterStoryName/80┃Simon Istvan
CharacterStoryAge/80┃29 years old
CharacterStoryHeight/80┃189 cm
CharacterStoryGender/80┃Male
CharacterStoryTitle/80┃“Every choice comes with its consequences.”
CharacterStoryDesc/80┃A former researcher who came to the island driven solely by his pursuit of knowledge. His serious demeanor rarely changes, making it hard to decipher his thoughts.\n\nWay before joining Aglaia, Istvan was already deeply fascinated by quantum mechanics, particularly the multiverse interpretation. His research focused on the superposition of separate worldlines and whether choices could influence them.\n\nWhile studying VF abilities related to quantum mechanics and dimensions, Istvan was severely injured. In that moment, he foresaw a catastrophic future brought on by VF.  In order to confirm whether this was the future of his world, he decided to participate in the experiment himself.\n\nHe's convinced that only those who survive on the island, where life and death are intertwined, will remain until the end. \nHis hypothesis is that Lumia Island might be the closest place to the new era humanity is about to face.
CharacterPlayTip/1┃Jackie is a serial killer who relentlessly pursues and massacres her targets. She gains even more power with every kill.
CharacterPlayTip/2┃Aya is a ranged character with high stability who can easily hit enemies with her skills from a long distance.
CharacterPlayTip/3┃Fiora uses her agility as a fencer to control her distance from enemies, dealing extra damage with each successive hit.
CharacterPlayTip/4┃Magnus is a legendary biker who won't hesitate to take on 17 enemies at once.
CharacterPlayTip/5┃Zahir is a devout believer who becomes faster and deals extra damage with each hit, showcasing his explosive power.
CharacterPlayTip/6┃Nadine is a master at hunting, skilled at using Bows and Traps. She becomes stronger with each Wild Animal she hunts.
CharacterPlayTip/7┃Hyunwoo is a cocky rebel who can deal significant damage with his powerful skills in different types of skirmishes.
CharacterPlayTip/8┃Hart uses music to keep her enemies in check, support allies, and entertain them with her melodies of love and peace.
CharacterPlayTip/9┃Isol is a former child soldier who specialized in guerilla warfare. He is good at strategic battles, using traps to gain favorable terrain, controlling the battle from afar, and destroying the enemy's will to fight.
CharacterPlayTip/10┃Li Dailin can neutralize any enemy test subject with her excellent dashing and charging abilities. She can deflect attacks in dangerous moments when she's Tipsy.
CharacterPlayTip/11┃Yuki uses his practiced kendo skills to hit with wide-range attacks that ignore defense and slice through space.
CharacterPlayTip/12┃Hyejin uses her talismans to stack bad luck on her enemies and activate Three Calamities. Her sneaky approach and wide-range Crowd Control allow her to take the initiative in combat.
CharacterPlayTip/13┃Xiukai uses his chef skills to help his allies maintain HP, and provides combat assistance with his high HP and wide-range Crowd Control.
CharacterPlayTip/14┃Chiara is a nun consumed by hatred. She leaves her mark on targets she is obsessed with, relentlessly harassing them with her HP and Shield, before punishing her broken down foes.
CharacterPlayTip/15┃Sissela is terminally ill and frail, but with the help of her imaginary friend "Wilson," is able to keep her enemies at bay from a safe distance.
CharacterPlayTip/16┃Silvia is a motorcycle racer who keeps enemies at bay from afar. She can accumulate fuel, quickly approach enemies on her bike, and deliver devastating blows to finish them off.
CharacterPlayTip/17┃Adriana slowly burns enemies with her flamethrower. The tighter and more confined the terrain, the stronger her control of the area is.
CharacterPlayTip/18┃Shoichi is an assassin who can quickly approach the enemy and deal significant damage with multiple daggers in the blink of an eye.
CharacterPlayTip/19┃Emma enjoys taunting her enemies by attacking from a safe distance with her flashy magic tools or switching positions to surprise them.
CharacterPlayTip/20┃Lenox doesn't hesitate to bum rush enemy lines. She sometimes even reels them in like a fish.
CharacterPlayTip/21┃Rozzi is highly mobile in any combat, wearing down her enemies with nonstop, explosive firepower.
CharacterPlayTip/22┃Luke is a mysterious janitor who uses his superior mobility and tricky moves to surprise his enemies before hitting them with his basic attack.
CharacterPlayTip/23┃Cathy uses her surgical knowledge to deal fatal wounds to her enemies. Her quick agility allows her to exploit any gap in an enemy's defense.
CharacterPlayTip/24┃Adela can command chess pieces to swing the battle in her favor, exploit any gaps to an enemy's defense, and deal massive damage in an instant.
CharacterPlayTip/25┃The closer Bernice's shotguns are, the more damage he does. He can also easily take down enemies that step on a Foothold Trap.
CharacterPlayTip/26┃Barbara is a robotics engineer who uses homemade Sentry Guns, Lasers and explosions to take over areas and stop enemies.
CharacterPlayTip/27┃Alex is a master spy who uses a multitude of weapons and tactical camouflage to confuse his enemies.
CharacterPlayTip/28┃Sua is a librarian who conjours up stories from books, allowing her to use her skills in short bursts and reduce her cooldown through melee combat.
CharacterPlayTip/29┃Leon creates pools of water and waves to protect his allies through wide-range Crowd Control or shields.
CharacterPlayTip/30┃Eleven uses her high HP and continuous healing ability to draw her enemies' attention, while supplying allies with hamburgers to heal them.
CharacterPlayTip/31┃Rio is a basic attack-based ranged character who can switch between her clunky but long-range Daikyu and her relatively short but nimble Haikyu depending on the situation.
CharacterPlayTip/32┃William can quickly move, sliding without missing a single ball and  delivering powerful pitches befitting of a star pitcher.
CharacterPlayTip/33┃The feisty Nicky doesn't hesitate to rush an enemy, blocking key skills with her Guard ability and disrupting enemy lines with her Crowd Control abilities.
CharacterPlayTip/34┃Nathapon is a photographer who wants to capture every moment. He can lock enemies in place with his photo abilities then chains skills together to defeat them.
CharacterPlayTip/35┃Jan uses his quick kickboxing attacks to unleash unleash devastating combos, especially if he uses the ropes in the boxing ring to incapacitate his opponents for extended periods of time.
CharacterPlayTip/36┃Psychic Eva can hit multiple enemies from a long distance. However, she lacks means to counterattack against close-range enemies. 
CharacterPlayTip/37┃Daniel is an assassin who can deal massive damage to anyone marked with Growing Inspiration. He is especially dangerous at night when it's easier to find and approach enemies.
CharacterPlayTip/38┃Jenny is an actress who can act her way out of any situation, switching between her agile Black Tea and aggressive Red Wine abilities.
CharacterPlayTip/39┃Camilo is a passionate dancer who approaches his enemies with the grace and flexibility of a dancer to unleash a flurry of flashy melee attacks.
CharacterPlayTip/40┃Chloe is a puppeteer who is always accompanied by her puppet, Nina. Nina can be piloted directly, and the two showoff their perfect synergy in combat together.
CharacterPlayTip/41┃Johann is a priest who specializes in aiding and protecting allies through divine faith. He can perform miracles that can turn the tide in unfavorable battles. 
CharacterPlayTip/42┃Bianca can covert damage into HP Regen like a vampire, and can effectively dominate any battlefield with wide-range damage everywhere around her.
CharacterPlayTip/43┃Celine uses deployable bombs to take over area. The more her skills hit, the more bombs she can plant to dominate the battle.
CharacterPlayTip/44┃Echion is a frenzied combat maniac, disrupting enemies with his maneuverability and exuding enormous power when he goes on a rampage. The type of VF Prosthetic selected will determine how the battle plays out.
CharacterPlayTip/45┃Mai is a fashion designer with excellent transition skills. She disrupts the enemy with unpredictable movements while ensuring the safety of her allies.
CharacterPlayTip/46┃Aiden charges his Gunblade to gain ranged attack abilities. His high mobility allows him to move in style, whether it's melee or ranged combat.
CharacterPlayTip/47┃Phantom Thief Laura uses her whip to approach enemies with three-dimensional maneuvers, then unleashes rapid cooldown attack skills to overpower them.
CharacterPlayTip/48┃Tia combines yellow, blue, and red paints to disrupt enemies or heal herself. Using the bristles of her paintbrush to hit enemies is important in controlling distanced fighting and winning the battle.
CharacterPlayTip/49┃Felix is perfect for a hit-and-run gameplay style. With his specialized combo skills for distance control, he can mix basic attacks and sophisticated spear techniques to defeat his enemies.
CharacterPlayTip/50┃Elena  is a figure skater who skillfully moves across the ice, creating patterns and obstacles for those who dare to cross her path.
CharacterPlayTip/51┃Priya plays the sitar to serenade the plants around her. They bloom to create an advantageous battlefield, showing strength when taking on approaching enemies.
CharacterPlayTip/52┃Adina is an astrologer who gathers the strength of the Sun, Moon, and Stars to reflect into her crystal ball and use them as her skills. She sometimes can actively change fate.
CharacterPlayTip/53┃Markus is a fearless frontman who stands tall on the front lines, breaking enemy lines and taking control of the battlefield.
CharacterPlayTip/54┃Karla can throw and retrieve her harpoons within a short range, and can swing the battle in her favor with her excellent ranged abilities.
CharacterPlayTip/55┃Estelle is a reliable firefighter who can fend off enemy attacks with her fire shield, or appear from afar in her helitack to protect allies in danger.
CharacterPlayTip/56┃Piolo is a martial artist who loves to train. His melee attacks make it easy to slice and dice his way across the battlefield, deflecting and dodging enemy attacks.
CharacterPlayTip/57┃War correspondent and journalist Martina aims to uncover the truth about Lumia Island. When she's done filming and starts broadcasting, her firepower and Crowd Control abilities make fights easy.
CharacterPlayTip/58┃Haze is a calculating arms dealer who can endlessly swap out a variety of weapons to unleash massive firepower over different battle distances.
CharacterPlayTip/59┃Isaac is a ruthless, corrupt cop. His excellent mobility allows him to get close to enemies, dealing powerful single-target damage.
CharacterPlayTip/60┃Pursuing the art of perfection, Tazia scatters her sharpened Glass Blade to create an advantageous battlefield, then rushes forward to take control of it.
CharacterPlayTip/61┃Irem is a cat who seeks love. Depending on the situation, Irem can keep her ranged Irem form or transform into a cat who excels in close combat.
CharacterPlayTip/62┃Theodore is a sniper with perfect markmanship. He excels at disrupting enemies from long range and assisting allies in combat.
CharacterPlayTip/63┃Possessed by a ghost, Ly Anh terrifies enemies as battles draw on. Her skills become stronger after possession, with one having the powerful ability to drain blood.
CharacterPlayTip/64┃Vanya flies freely with her butterflies, accumulating damage over time with her mobility and viability. She can even lull enemies to sleep, leaving them defenseless and wide open for attack.
CharacterPlayTip/65┃When they fight together, twins Debi & Marlene, are more powerful than anyone else thanks to their special power. They deal damage by tag teaming and coordinating with each other to dominate battles.
CharacterPlayTip/66┃Arda engages in battles using artifacts. He is able to uncover and use the powers hidden in these artifacts and create battle variables in various ways.
CharacterPlayTip/67┃Abigail defies the concept of space and teleports herself to her target. She swings her large scythe to deal massive damage in the area.
CharacterPlayTip/68┃Alonso is a leader of action who specializes in controlling enemies with his magnetic powers and holding up the front lines.
CharacterPlayTip/69┃Leni loves to play pranks on everyone, taunting her enemies and helping her allies with her toys.
CharacterPlayTip/70┃Tsubame is a rigorously trained combat agent. She carves marks on her targets with her kunai and cuts through them to deal great damage.
CharacterPlayTip/71┃Kenneth unleashes his supressed rage in flames, burning everything that stands in his way and dealing powerful damage.
CharacterPlayTip/72┃Katja uses her drone to locate enemies and target them from a long distance.
CharacterPlayTip/73┃Charlotte is a kind-hearted character that can use her light to support her allies and neutralize damage.
CharacterPlayTip/74┃Darko will do whatever it takes to get what he wants, including controlling and robbing his enemies until they give in. 
CharacterPlayTip/75┃Lenore's music is inspired by the echoes of pain and screams, putting up performances so powerful they can make her audience insane.
CharacterPlayTip/76┃Garnet has a strong obsession with pain and actively enjoys taking and dealing damage on the front lines. \nShe traps both herself and her target in an Iron Maiden, inflicting eternal torment.
CharacterPlayTip/77┃Yumin, the Taoist, moves effortlessly through enemies like the wind, harnessing his growing power on Wind Zones to control the flow of battle.
CharacterPlayTip/78┃Hisui, a member of Nichirinkai, is on the hunt for someone who betrayed the organization. Passionate about collecting swords, she channels their memories and powers, unleashing a wide array of techniques to dominate the battlefield.
CharacterPlayTip/79┃Justyna is an outgoing girl who dreams of becoming a hero of justice. She delivers continuous attacks with relentless precision, unleashing powerful energy blasts capable of devastating entire enemy zones.
CharacterPlayTip/80┃Istvan grows stronger, unlocking an alternate version of himself that produces different results from his usual actions. He constantly explores various possibilities in each combat, running experiments over and over to achieve better outcomes.

분쇄기┃Shredder
분쇄기설명┃Items can be shredded in any area of the Screen. Shred items are immediately deleted.

분쇄 불가 알림┃Only equipment can be shredded.
